name: spellServer(_:suggestCompletionsForPartialWordRange:in:language:)
desc: This delegate method returns an array of possible word completions from the spell checker, based on a partially completed string and a given range.
declaration:
optional func spellServer(_ sender: NSSpellServer, 
suggestCompletionsForPartialWordRange range: NSRange, 
                       in string: String, 
                 language: String) -> [String]?
